channel.title: cat-MŌ TE Ū KI TE KAWENATA on devotional.gq
channel.description: Recent content in cat-MŌ TE Ū KI TE KAWENATA on devotional.gq

item.title: Prayer bpn10241 in Māori
item.description: Kia whakaūhia aku hīkoi, e Te Ariki, ki Tōu Ara kia whaikahatia ai e Koe ō mātou ngākau ki te whakarongo ki a Koe. Kia hurihia ō mātou kanohi ki te ātaahua o Tōu kotahitanga, kia harikoa hoki ō mātou ngākau ki ngā tohu o Tōu atuatanga kotahi. Whakareia ō mātou tinana ki te korowai o Tōu whai rawa, tangohia mai i ō mātou karu te ārai o te haratanga, tukua mai te kapu o Tō atawhai; ka whaikōrerotia ai e te mauri o ngā koiora katoa ko Tōu korōria i te aroaro o te kitenga i Tōu nui.

item.title: Prayer bpn10242 in Māori
item.description: E Te Atua mākoha! Kia whakamoemititia Koe i te mea Nāu ahau i whakaoho, Nāu i tō mai te hiringa o te mahara. Nāu i hōmai te karu hei titiro, i aroha mai ki te taringa rongo, Nāu ahau i ārahi ki Tōu kīngitanga, i arataki ki te huarahi tika hei haerenga māku, Nāu ahau i tātaki ki Tōu nei Ara. Nāu te huarahi tika i whakaata mai, nāu ahau i uru atu ai ki te Āka o te Whakaoranga.
